House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00532
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE PACKAGING, USE, SALE, DISTRIBUTION, AND ADVERTISEMENTS OF ELECTRONIC SMOKING DEVICES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9211, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE TOBACCO REGULATION ACT OF 2003, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Tobacco Regulation Act Of 2003
ABSTRACT : Aims to prevent the use of electronic cigarettes by including it under the regulated tobacco products.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATOCABE, RODEL M., GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A., CO, CHRISTOPHER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
